name: es2015-library-skeleton
description: my personal skeleton for ES2015 library NPM packages

scripts.build: rm -rf lib; NODE_ENV=production babel src --out-dir lib
scripts.test: rm -rf testlib; NODE_ENV=production babel src --out-dir testlib/src && NODE_ENV=production babel test --out-dir testlib/test && jasmine
scripts.prepublish: eslint *.js src test examples --fix && flow status && npm run test && npm run build

author: Andy Edwards
